title: Next up & coming DC neighnorhoods?
text:
I'm a current business owner in MD, looking to open a mixed retail venue in DC in the next 5 years and I have three questions for ya! (Mixed venue retail means several small businesses under a single roof, think Union Market-ish).

1.  What are some of your fav up & coming neighborhoods and why do you love them?

2. What makes that particular neighborhood a great location for a mixed retail venue?

3. What types of business would you like to see in a mixed retail venue? Food, drinks, art, etc.

Lay it on me, Reddit!! 😁😊💜
